response.original_title: CRPPP -包括的抑圧防止プログラム-
response.overview: This is a video that captures the process of collaborating with a woman who is both a person with a mental illness and a psychiatric care worker, as we discuss her "things she wants to try" and bring them to life.  She tells me, an artist, that "artists are skilled at playing in society's miniature garden, but I want to break that "miniature garden." While I cannot eliminate all the oppression she experiences from her "miniature garden," I decided to explore ways to look at her miniature garden together and play without breaking it.
response.title: CRPPP -Comprehensive Repression Prevention and Protection Programme-
